history.proof: intros d p p' H. destruct H as [plp [H1 H2]]. shelve.

exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (p : prec_list) (m : Map bool), pl_non_empty m p = true -> exists plp : pl_path, pl_path_incl plp p /\\ pl_path_true plp m" on hypothesis of type "prec_list_kill (dta_non_empty_states d) p = Some p'".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (d : preDTA) (p p' : prec_list), prec_list_kill (dta_non_empty_states d) p = Some p' -> exists plp : pl_path, pl_path_incl plp p'

Premises:
prec_list_kill = fix prec_list_kill (m : Map bool) (p : prec_list) {struct p} : option prec_list := match p with | prec_cons a la (prec_cons _ _ _ as ls) => match MapGet bool m a with | Some true => match prec_list_kill m la with | Some la' => match prec_list_kill m ls with | Some ls' => Some (prec_cons a la' ls') | None => Some (prec_cons a la' prec_empty) end | None => match prec_list_kill m ls with | Some ls' => Some ls' | None => None end end | _ => prec_list_kill m ls end | prec_cons a la prec_empty => match MapGet bool m a with | Some true => match prec_list_kill m la with | Some la' => Some (prec_cons a la' prec_empty) | None => None end | _ => None end | prec_empty => Some prec_empty end : Map bool -> prec_list -> option prec_list
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A For Some: Arguments are renamed to A, a For Some: Argument A is implicit and maximally inserted For None: Argument A is implicit and maximally inserted For option: Argument scope is [type_scope] For Some: Argument scopes are [type_scope _] For None: Argument scope is [type_scope]
dta_non_empty_states = fun d : preDTA => power (Map bool) (dta_app_ne d) (map_mini state d) (S (MapCard state d)) : preDTA -> Map bool
Inductive pl_path_incl : pl_path -> prec_list -> Prop := pl_path_incl_nil : pl_path_incl pl_path_nil prec_empty | pl_path_incl_cons : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp la -> pl_path_incl (pl_path_cons a plp) (prec_cons a la ls) | pl_path_incl_next : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp ls -> plp <> pl_path_nil -> pl_path_incl plp (prec_cons a la ls)
Inductive prec_list : Set := prec_cons : ad -> prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list | prec_empty : prec_list
preDTA = Map state : Set
Inductive pl_path : Set := pl_path_nil : pl_path | pl_path_cons : ad -> pl_path -> pl_path
dt_kill_empty_d_1 : forall (n : nat) (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (tl : term_list), dt_kill_empty_def_0 n -> term_high_0 tl <= n -> liste_reconnait d p tl -> exists p' : prec_list, prec_list_kill (dta_non_empty_states d) p = Some p' /\ liste_reconnait (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states d) d) p' tl
dt_kill_empty_r_1 : forall (p' : prec_list) (n : nat) (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (tl : term_list), dt_kill_empty_def_1 n -> term_high_0 tl <= n -> liste_reconnait (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states d) d) p tl -> prec_list_kill (dta_non_empty_states d) p' = Some p -> liste_reconnait d p' tl
pl_kill_1 : forall (p p' : prec_list) (m : Map bool) (pl : pl_path), prec_list_kill m p = Some p' -> pl_path_incl pl p' -> pl_path_incl pl p /\ pl_path_true pl m
st_kill_2 : forall (s : state) (m : Map bool) (a : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list (states_kill_aux m s) a = Some p -> exists p' : prec_list, MapGet prec_list s a = Some p' /\ prec_list_kill m p' = Some p
st_kill_1 : forall (s : state) (m : Map bool) (a : ad) (p p' : prec_list), prec_list_kill m p = Some p' -> MapGet prec_list s a = Some p -> exists s' : state, states_kill m s = Some s' /\ MapGet prec_list s' a = Some p'
st_kill_0 : forall (s : state) (m : Map bool) (a : ad) (p p' : prec_list), prec_list_kill m p = Some p' -> MapGet prec_list s a = Some p -> MapGet prec_list (states_kill_aux m s) a = Some p'
kill_empty_correct_wrt_sign_invar_0 : forall (p p' : prec_list) (m : Map bool) (n : nat), pl_tl_length p n -> prec_list_kill m p = Some p' -> pl_tl_length p' n
pl_kill_0 : forall (p : prec_list) (m : Map bool) (plp : pl_path), pl_path_incl plp p -> pl_path_true plp m -> exists pl : prec_list, prec_list_kill m p = Some pl /\ pl_path_incl plp pl
pl_non_empty_path_true_rev : forall (p : prec_list) (m : Map bool), pl_non_empty m p = true -> exists plp : pl_path, pl_path_incl plp p /\ pl_path_true plp m
pl_path_rec_equiv_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list), liste_reconnait d pl tl -> exists plp : pl_path, pl_path_incl plp pl /\ pl_path_recon d tl plp
pl_path_rec_equiv_0_def = fun (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list) => liste_reconnait d pl tl -> exists plp : pl_path, pl_path_incl plp pl /\ pl_path_recon d tl plp : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop
pl_path_recon_true : forall (d : preDTA) (plp : pl_path) (tl : term_list), pl_path_recon d tl plp -> pl_path_true plp (dta_non_empty_states d)
pl_path_incl_ind : forall P : pl_path -> prec_list -> Prop, P pl_path_nil prec_empty -> (forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp la -> P plp la -> P (pl_path_cons a plp) (prec_cons a la ls)) -> (forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp ls -> P plp ls -> plp <> pl_path_nil -> P plp (prec_cons a la ls)) -> forall (p : pl_path) (p0 : prec_list), pl_path_incl p p0 -> P p p0
pl_path_rec_equiv_1 : forall (plp : pl_path) (pl : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp pl -> forall (d : preDTA) (tl : term_list) (n : nat), pl_path_recon d tl plp -> pl_tl_length pl n -> liste_reconnait d pl tl
pl_path_incl_next : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp ls -> plp <> pl_path_nil -> pl_path_incl plp (prec_cons a la ls)
Inductive pl_path_incl : pl_path -> prec_list -> Prop := pl_path_incl_nil : pl_path_incl pl_path_nil prec_empty | pl_path_incl_cons : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp la -> pl_path_incl (pl_path_cons a plp) (prec_cons a la ls) | pl_path_incl_next : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp ls -> plp <> pl_path_nil -> pl_path_incl plp (prec_cons a la ls)
dt_non_empty_fix_2 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad), MapGet bool (dta_non_empty_states d) a = Some true -> exists n : nat, MapGet bool (power (Map bool) (dta_app_ne d) (map_mini state d) n) a = Some true
pl_path_incl_length_2 : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp ls -> pl_path_incl_length_def plp ls -> plp <> pl_path_nil -> pl_path_incl_length_def plp (prec_cons a la ls)
pl_non_empty_path_true_2 : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp ls -> pl_non_empty_path_true_def_0 plp ls -> plp <> pl_path_nil -> pl_non_empty_path_true_def_0 plp (prec_cons a la ls)
pl_path_rec_equiv_1_2 : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp ls -> pl_path_rec_equiv_1_def plp ls -> plp <> pl_path_nil -> pl_path_rec_equiv_1_def plp (prec_cons a la ls)
dt_non_empty_r_2 : forall (p : prec_list) (m : Map bool), pl_non_empty m p = true -> exists pl : pl_path, pl_path_true pl m /\ pl_path_incl pl p
dt_non_empty_r_4 : forall (p : prec_list) (n : nat) (d : preDTA) (pl : pl_path), dt_non_empty_r_def_0 n -> pl_path_true pl (power (Map bool) (dta_app_ne d) (map_mini state d) n) -> pl_path_incl pl p -> exists tl : term_list, liste_reconnait d p tl
pl_path_rec_equiv_1_def = fun (plp : pl_path) (pl : prec_list) => pl_path_incl plp pl -> forall (d : preDTA) (tl : term_list) (n : nat), pl_path_recon d tl plp -> pl_tl_length pl n -> liste_reconnait d pl tl : pl_path -> prec_list -> Prop
pl_path_incl_length_1 : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp la -> pl_path_incl_length_def plp la -> pl_path_incl_length_def (pl_path_cons a plp) (prec_cons a la ls)
pl_non_empty_path_true_1 : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp la -> pl_non_empty_path_true_def_0 plp la -> pl_non_empty_path_true_def_0 (pl_path_cons a plp) (prec_cons a la ls)
pl_path_rec_equiv_1_1 : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp la -> pl_path_rec_equiv_1_def plp la -> pl_path_rec_equiv_1_def (pl_path_cons a plp) (prec_cons a la ls)
dt_non_empty_fix_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (n : nat), MapGet bool (power (Map bool) (dta_app_ne d) (map_mini state d) n) a = Some true -> MapGet bool (dta_non_empty_states d) a = Some true
pl_path_incl_length : forall (plp : pl_path) (pl : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_path_incl plp pl -> pl_tl_length pl n -> pl_path_length plp = n
pl_path_incl_length_def = fun (plp : pl_path) (pl : prec_list) => forall n : nat, pl_path_incl plp pl -> pl_tl_length pl n -> pl_path_length plp = n : pl_path -> prec_list -> Prop
pl_path_incl_cons : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp la -> pl_path_incl (pl_path_cons a plp) (prec_cons a la ls)
pl_path_exists : forall pl : prec_list, exists p : pl_path, pl_path_incl p pl
non_empty_pl_path_exists : forall pl : prec_list, pl <> prec_empty -> exists p : pl_path, pl_path_incl p pl /\ 1 <= pl_path_length p
pl_kill_prec_empty : forall (p : prec_list) (m : Map bool), prec_list_kill m p = Some prec_empty -> p = prec_empty
dt_kill_empty_r : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states d) d) a t -> reconnaissance d a t
dt_kill_empty_d : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance d a t -> reconnaissance (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states d) d) a t
dt_non_empty_fix : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad), MapGet bool (dta_non_empty_states d) a = Some true < -> (exists t : term, reconnaissance d a t)
prec_in_dta_cont = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad) (p0 : prec_list), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p0 /\ prec_contained p p0 : preDTA -> prec_list -> Prop
pl_path_recon_ind : forall P : preDTA -> term_list -> pl_path -> Prop, (forall d : preDTA, P d tnil pl_path_nil) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (plp : pl_path) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a t -> pl_path_recon d tl plp -> P d tl plp -> P d (tcons t tl) (pl_path_cons a plp)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (t : term_list) (p0 : pl_path), pl_path_recon p t p0 -> P p t p0
dt_non_empty_r : forall (n : nat) (d : preDTA) (a : ad), MapGet bool (power (Map bool) (dta_app_ne d) (map_mini state d) n) a = Some true -> exists t : term, reconnaissance d a t
dt_non_empty_d : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance d a t -> exists n : nat, MapGet bool (power (Map bool) (dta_app_ne d) (map_mini state d) n) a = Some true

```intros d p p' H.
apply pl_non_empty_path_true_rev in H.
destruct H as [plp [H1 H2]].
exists plp.
exact H2.```

original: intros d p p' H. apply pl_non_empty_path_true_rev in H. destruct H as [plp [H1 H2]]. exists plp. apply H2.
